power.description: The namespace and ID of the power that uses the [Toggle (Power Type)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/toggle).
power.markdownDescription: The namespace and ID of the power that uses the [Toggle (Power Type)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/toggle).

type.description:
[Entity Action Type](../entity_action_types.md)

Toggles the state of a power that uses the [Toggle (Power Type)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/toggle).

Type ID: `origins:toggle`

!!! note

    Not to be confused with [Toggle (Power Type)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/toggle).
